baseInfo.name: Sophie Au
baseInfo.bio: I'm a full-stack developer and web designer with a passion for user experience design and agile consulting. When I'm not coding or designing, I can be found exploring Berlin's hipster coffee shops.
baseInfo.bioShort: I'm a full-stack developer and web designer with a passion for user experience design and agile consulting. When I'm not coding or designing, I'm exploring Berlin.

baseInfo.name: Jean Bauer
baseInfo.bio: I’m a twenty-three-years-old consultant developer focused on building web solutions for real-life problems, most of the time using JavaScript. I'm currently working for ThoughtWorks.
baseInfo.bioShort: I’m a consultant developer focused on building web solutions for real-life problems, most of the time using JavaScript. I'm currently working for ThoughtWorks.

baseInfo.name: Elloise Przybylo
baseInfo.bio: I am a business analyst living in Brisbane, Australia. I have a Bachelor of Information Technology from the University of Queensland with a focus on web and user experience design.
baseInfo.bioShort: I'm a business analyst living in Brisbane. I have a Bachelor of Information Technology from the University of Queensland focussing on web and user experience design.

baseInfo.name: Jackie Robinson
baseInfo.bio: Hi, I'm Jackie, a software developer from Slidell, Louisiana. Fun Facts: I'm an identical twin. Fun Fact 2: I'm not named after the baseball player. I love Android. I have serious obsession with music. Did I mention I love Android?
baseInfo.bioShort: I'm a software developer from Slidell, Louisiana. Fun Facts: I'm an identical twin. I love Android. I have serious obsession with music. Did I mention I love Android?

baseInfo.name: Kamalashree Nagaraj
baseInfo.bio: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for back-end development, data analytics and agile consulting. When I'm not coding, you can find me, the gardener, the gamer or the artist!
baseInfo.bioShort: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for back-end development, data analytics and agile consulting. When not coding, you can find me, the gardener, the gamer, the artist!

baseInfo.name: Andrei Cartan
baseInfo.bio: I'm a tennis fan with a big passion for trains, lately discovered DevOps which I am very interested in mastering. AWS and Terraform fan and doing AR in iOS as a hobby. Pushing to launch my first mobile app and speak at a conference.
baseInfo.bioShort: Tennis fan with a big passion for trains and DevOps (Terraform and AWS). Doing AR in iOS as a hobby. Pushing to launch my first mobile app and speak at a conference.

baseInfo.name: Nimish Singh
baseInfo.bio: I enjoy looking through different technologies and tools (not limited to any one domain as of now). I am a sincere guy who thrives in a team environment. I also enjoy making pencil sketches and reading books.
baseInfo.bioShort: I enjoy looking through different technologies and tools. I am a sincere guy who thrives in a team environment. I also enjoy making pencil sketches and reading books.
